        Parameters:
        url - Host url with port
        onSuccess - is called immediately.

        Asynchronously retrieves ScPublicKey and creates authenticated session.
        Parameters:
        url - Sitecore instance URL / server URL.
        name - User login name.
        password - User password
        onSuccess - Success result callback.

      • newSession

        public static ScApiSession newSession(java.lang.String url,
                      ScPublicKey key,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String password)
        Creates authenticated session based on existing key.
        Parameters:
        url - Sitecore instance URL / server URL.
        key - ScPublicKey key for authenticated requests.
        name - User login name.
        password - User password

        Creates Request for retrieving ScPublicKey.
        Parameters:

        onSuccess - Success result callback.
        onError - Error result callback
        Returns:
        Request.
